contextId.information: Here the word "we" refers to Peter and the other apostles, but not to those to whom he is writing. AT: "we apostles have received" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
Here the word "we" refers to Peter and the other apostles, but not to his readers. AT: "For we apostles did not follow cleverly made-up stories" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_exclusive]])
contextId.quote: For we did not follow cleverly invented myths
